product_name: Chaco Vade Bulloo Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Chaco Vade Bulloo Shoes blend the famous comfort of Chaco sandals with the structure and lightweight coverage of athletic shoes so you can cover miles of trail without thinking of your feet. Mesh uppers with suede overlays provide durable, flexible support and breathability for comfort in warm weather. Toe bumpers protect feet from rocks and trail debris; toe and heel loops allow easy on/off. LUVSEAT(TM) X03 platform features thin-profile polyurethane midsoles, which provide superior arch support for all-day wear. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles provide excellent traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: The Chaco Vade Bulloo Shoes blend the famous comfort of Chaco sandals with the structure and lightweight coverage of athletic shoes so you can cover miles of trail without thinking of your feet.
